title: Conditions For A Political Marriage
alternative_title: Conditions For A Political Marriage ; Conditions For an Arranged Marriage ; 정략결혼의 조건
status: Conditions For A Political Marriage ; Conditions For an Arranged Marriage ; 정략결혼의 조건
description:
Description :
        It was an arranged marriage I had no choice but to agree to.The conditions he set were simple:Don't expect love. Live as a show-window couple and divorce when the time is right.I planned to quietly go along with his demands and part ways cleanly.Until the night I spent with my husband.After that night, everything changed.The arranged marriage, which had begun for mutual benefit, started to intertwine with deeper emotions as time went on.
